channel.title: Latest News on Kriegstein Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Latest News on Kriegstein Lab

item.title: Jian Yang and Monica Hall Win the Best Paper Award at Wowchemy 2020
item.description: Congratulations to Jian Yang and Monica Hall for winning the Best Paper Award at the 2020 Conference on Wowchemy for their paper “Learning Wowchemy”.

item.title: Richard Hendricks Wins First Place in the Wowchemy Prize
item.description: Congratulations to Richard Hendricks for winning first place in the Wowchemy Prize.
